title: Propulsion Assignment
description: This assignment focuses on the principles of rocket propulsion and the analysis of propulsion systems.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Students will conduct an analysis of combustion processes and their implications in propulsion.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: This project involves the design and evaluation of rocket nozzles for optimized performance.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A quiz assessing knowledge of aerodynamic principles and their applications in engineering.

title: Flow Analysis
description: This assignment requires the analysis of fluid flow patterns and their effects on aerodynamic design.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Students will perform a heating analysis to understand thermal dynamics in aerodynamics.

title: Structural Design Task
description: This task involves designing a structural component for a spacecraft, emphasizing material selection and integrity.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Students will conduct calculations to determine orbital trajectories and parameters for spacecraft.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: An exam assessing knowledge and understanding of systems engineering principles applied to spacecraft design.
